text: @realDonaldTrump WHAT vaccine work in looking promising?  Where are the Covid19 tests for every American?  WHAT IS OUR NATIONAL STRATEGY?  YOU ARE AN EPIC FAILURE!  GET OFF YOUR ASS AND DO SOMETHING OTHER THAT BLOW SMOKE!
